get_recent_active_customers: SELECT [BTL_BILLERID], [ACCOUNTNUM], [BPC_COMPANYBANK], [NAME], [BTL_CUSTOMERSTATUS],[CREATEDDATETIME] FROM [WEBORDER].[dbo].[CUSTTABLE] WHERE [CREATEDDATETIME] >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, GETDATE()) AND [CREATEDDATETIME] < DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) AND [BTL_CUSTOMERSTATUS] IN (0, 2) AND [BTL_BILLERID] != '' ORDER BY [MODIFIEDDATETIME] DESC;
